title: [Chinese theatre]
creator_credit: Victoria Mercanton, Marc Maurette, Theodora Olembert, Procinex and Triangle Productions
brief_description: Episodes are performed by a Peking theatrical company which portray some Chinese legends and symbols; “Trouble in Heaven”, “The Legend of the King and the monkeys”, “The Greatness of love”, “Story of the beautiful white fairy”, “Where the roads meet”, “A Case of mistaken identity” and finally “Autumn River”.
